meta.title: AquaPump — Precision Water Intelligence
meta.description: Apple-level industrial design meets Tesla-grade analytics. Premium pump systems ready for Supabase, AI, and smart telemetry.

cta.title: Ready to accelerate deployment?
cta.body: Schedule an engineering consult and receive a tailored AquaPump roadmap in under 48 hours.

hero.title: Future-proof water infrastructure.
hero.subtitle: We design, deploy, and maintain premium pump systems for critical industries with signature Apple-level finish and Tesla-grade performance analytics.
features: Digital twin dashboards out of the box
Supabase-ready event streaming for instant alerts
Sustainable builds with premium industrial design
hero.panel_body: Since 1991 we have delivered silent efficiency for municipal, industrial, and agri-tech partners.

brands.copy: Global infrastructure leaders lean on AquaPump aesthetics and reliability for mission critical distribution.

sections.expertise_lead: Precision engineering, digital monitoring, and lifecycle support to keep critical systems running.

cards.title: Municipal & Infra
cards.desc: Large-scale pumping stations, wastewater, pressure boosting & telemetry.

cards.desc: Process pumps, VFD optimization, energy audits & turnkey retrofits.

cards.desc: Irrigation systems, fertigation, and high-efficiency multi-stage pumps.

impact.title: Speed, stability, and savings
impact.lead: Optimized UI and UX deliver quicker decisions, while our Israeli-built hardware cuts commissioning time and energy consumption across every deployment.
bullets: Responsive across mobile, tablet, and command centers
Edge and cloud telemetry tuned for sub-second refresh
SEO-first architecture to help prospects find AquaPump

metrics.title: ↓ 42% faster launch

Shared R&D fueling next-gen pump intelligence

timeline.body: A modular dashboard canvas supports AI, chatbot, and analytics integrations without performance trade-offs.

products.title: Signature systems by AquaPump
products.lead: Every unit ships with pristine finishes, smart telemetry, and energy-smart configurations ready for your Supabase keys.

cta.title: Connect the field to your command center
cta.lead: Our control suite ships ready to plug into Supabase, Azure, or AWS so your telemetry, customer portal, and billing flows are a configuration away.
cta.caption: Add credentials, containerize, deploy. That’s it.

hero.title: Israeli R&D engineered for reliability
hero.lead: From Tel Aviv labs to global field deployments, AquaPump fuses premium industrial design with live telemetry, AI diagnostics, and edge-ready automation.

overview.title: Architecture built for speed & scale
overview.lead: Every AquaPump deployment layers Israeli-crafted hardware with a composable software stack: edge controllers, secure APIs, and a Supabase-ready data fabric.
points: Next.js experience layer with ISR and localized routing
Serverless API mesh on AWS Lambda & FastAPI microservices
Supabase Postgres + Redis cache for millisecond telemetry

innovation.title: Tel Aviv labs to live deployment
innovation.lead: Our R&D sprint cadence blends Aquatech Group manufacturing with agile firmware updates, ensuring rapid prototyping and bulletproof releases.

items.title: Discovery
items.body: Industry workshops in Israel uncover requirements, compliance, and integration touchpoints.

items.title: Digital twin modelling
items.body: Rapid CAD + CFD modelling, followed by Supabase-linked simulations to validate edge conditions.

items.title: Pilot & telemetry
items.body: Edge nodes stream encrypted data to our observability layer, ensuring sub-second visibility.

items.title: Scale & iterate
items.body: CI/CD pushes updates globally with feature flags, analytics, and guardrails baked in.

capabilities.title: Designed for mission-critical uptime
capabilities.lead: Each module is modular, API-first, and built to integrate with future AI co-pilots, CRM systems, and data lakes.

cards.title: Telemetry OS
cards.body: Event-driven data ingestion, Supabase replication, and real-time dashboards optimized for FCP <1.2s.

cards.title: AI diagnostics
cards.body: Predict failures with Aquatech-trained models feeding the AquaBot assistant and maintenance workflows.

cards.title: Security lattice
cards.body: Zero-trust policies, audit logging, CSP enforcement, and encrypted secrets across every environment.

cards.title: Edge orchestration
cards.body: Containerized firmware pipelines enable rollbacks, over-the-air updates, and offline-first resilience.

downloads.title: Specification library
downloads.lead: Access product spec sheets, BIM files, and cybersecurity policies curated for engineering partners.

items.body: IFC + Revit assets with localized pressure settings and telemetry points.

items.title: API reference
items.body: REST & GraphQL endpoints with webhook recipes for CRM and ERP systems.

hero.title: Outcomes engineered in Israel, delivered worldwide
hero.lead: Explore how AquaPump and the Aquatech Group transform critical infrastructure with measurable uptime, sustainability, and conversion gains.

metrics.title: Performance benchmarks we guarantee
metrics.lead: Measured across mobile and desktop, our digital and physical stack keeps conversions high and operational costs low.

case_studies.title: Real projects. Real numbers.
case_studies.lead: From Israeli municipalities to global agritech leaders, AquaPump delivers measurable performance improvements.

items.title: Dan Region pumping overhaul
items.body: Converted 18 pumping stations to AquaPump telemetry. Achieved 43% faster fault detection and 28% drop in truck rolls.

items.title: Galilee food processing plant
items.body: VFD retrofits with AquaPump analytics cut energy bills by 35% while keeping CIP cycles within ±1% pressure variance.

items.title: Negev smart irrigation
items.body: Deployed remote sensing with AquaBot insights. Water use dropped 31% while yields grew 18% year-over-year.

sustainability.title: Sustainable by design
sustainability.lead: Our roadmap aligns with Israeli GreenMark compliance and global ESG standards.
timeline: 2024 · 100% renewable energy powering our Israeli manufacturing partners.
2025 · Lifecycle analytics reduce carbon emissions per project by 22%.
2026 · Circular refurbishment program extends hardware life by 40%.

items.quote: “AquaPump gave us the polish of a consumer brand with the telemetry rigor we needed. Launch took weeks, not months.”
items.meta: Yael Cohen — CTO, Tel Aviv Water Authority

items.quote: “The Aquatech Group collaboration means we get Israeli expertise onsite plus global logistics. It’s a powerhouse.”

hero.title: Israeli heritage. Global water leadership.
hero.lead: AquaPump is a flagship company inside the Aquatech Group. Together we combine Tel Aviv innovation with a worldwide network of experts.

heritage.title: Built in Israel since 1991
heritage.lead: Our founding teams engineered the nation’s earliest desalination control systems. Today we channel that experience into digitized pumping ecosystems.
timeline: 1991 · Aquatech Group founded in Tel Aviv to accelerate water resilience.
2002 · AquaPump launches precision booster line serving national infrastructure.
2018 · Digital twin monitoring rolls out across all new deployments.

network.title: Rapid response, everywhere
network.lead: Our Israeli HQ orchestrates global field teams across Europe, North America, and APAC.
points: 24/7 command center in Tel Aviv monitors telemetry
Regional service hubs in Milan, Houston, Bengaluru, and Sydney
Shared knowledge base with multilingual playbooks
